settings.text: Win 6 months of educator-backed toys customized for your child's age and interest
Free toy exchanges (we will swap your toys out for the next progressive set every 2 months!)
Parenting content and support from our team of early childhood experts

settings.heading: How does the toy rental work?
settings.row_content: Select the membership that fits your family (either 5, 8 or 10 toys per shipment) and customize the toys you receive. We do free exchanges every 2 months.

settings.heading: How do exchanges work?
settings.row_content: We offer free shipping and exchanges every 2 months to maximize your child’s learning and reduce our shipping impact. You will receive an email when your exchange is due detailing the toys you will receive. You have 3 days to make a modification to your exchange by either modifying the toy selection or delaying your exchange. Keep your current kit of toys until the new one arrives ensuring no downtime between toys.

settings.heading: Can I get extra exchanges?
settings.row_content: YES! If you prepay for a year, you receive a bonus exchange to be used during the holidays or your little ones birthday at no extra charge.

settings.heading: Do you offer home pickup for exchanges?
settings.row_content: YES! If you prepay for 6 or 12 months you can schedule FedEx to pickup your return on your doorstep at no extra charge!

settings.heading: If my child falls in love with a toy, can I buy it?
settings.row_content: If you are a monthly subscriber and fall in love with a toy, you can purchase it when you exchange for 15% off the retail price. Unfortunately, we don’t sell our toys outside of our subscriptions.

settings.heading: Can I cancel anytime?
settings.row_content: We know renting toys is a new concept. That’s why there are no hidden contracts and you can cancel at any time without penalty in your subscription account.

settings.heading: How are the toys cleaned?
settings.row_content:
We safety-inspect, clean and reseal every returned toy.

To clean we use Force of Nature. “Force of Nature is an EPA-registered disinfectant & sanitizer that kills 99.9% of germs*, even Staph, MRSA, Norovirus, Influenza A, Salmonella, and Listeria when used as directed. It’s on EPA’s list of Disinfectants for Use Against SARS-CoV-2, the cause of COVID-19.” It is made without the use of toxic chemicals, added fragrance, dyes, preservatives or surfactants.

When necessary, we reseal using pure beeswax.

Toys are then air-dried, carefully repackaged and shipped where they spend between 3 - 5 days in transit.
